TAUNT.szText: And I've made contact with you! Prepare to die!
Couple? We're not married!
I don't know, maybe I'll send them my CV after I kill you!
PX? What the fuck does it even mean?
TAUNT.szTextCensored: PX? What the hell does it even mean?

TAUNT.szText: No shit, Sherlock!
It will be one-way trip for you!
Oh yes, by all means! Move out in the open!
Luck is for wusses, real professionals depend on their skill!
What? I can SEE you and HEAR you, you moron!
Yeah, and don't even think about a lunch break!
I'm sorry, didn't catch the name!
Doesn't matter, you'll be dead soon enough.
So THAT'S why she didn't get my postcard.
Indeed I do!
You know there's no such animal, right?
Not yet. But soon you'll meet him!
Trouble is my second name!
Like a bulldog!
You should be!
Your wish is my order!
Nobody ever does.
Just wait, and this trouble will run into YOU!.
Scoundrel? I'll make you eat those words!
No, thank you!
Will see who's about to teach whom!
You're right!
You don't deserve a chance!
Horoscopes lie!
Ding dong!
It's still not too late!
We'll check ourselves!
Need bubbles, sir?
Did you just call me an ass!?
Whatever.
I didn't understand a single word!
It will only get closer!
I'm not really evil... just misunderstood.
It's about to turn into full tournee!
"Stupid fools"? Are you even trying?
As you wish!
Hey! I'm a lady!
I'll dig you one! Six feet under!
Don't worry, I'll send you some!
I'll show you!
You'll wish you wouldn't ask!
You got it wrong, let me educate you!
Was that a rhetorical question?
Now, whose fault is it, if your cocksucker boss buys second hand guns?
TAUNT.szTextCensored: Now, whose fault is it, if your cheap ass boss buys second hand guns?

TAUNT.szText: And soon so will be you!
The only thing layin' low here, is you bitch!
Yeah right, that's why you're sweating!
Advice for today: avoid long travels, new relationships and BULLETS!
Mine said I will kill a lot of people today! I hope it will come true too!
Do people seriously believe in these things? Pathetic.
Tough? I could make that shot with eyes closed.
And that's just the beginning!
He loves you no more!
OK, this one's out. Next!
You'll be sorry for saying that!
Well, now we can play hide and seek!
You're right! It's the whole company here!
You should have used the plural! Guys, lot's of guys!
Will see about that...
No, it doesn't, but don't worry, we'll be gentle!
Nice grammar, asshole!
Need supplies, wacko?
Here, I'll give you some!
No, you just suck, that's it! No air involved!
Never got this - why bring a knife to a gun fight?
Funny indeed, we had so much fun with him as a target practice!
I know some jokes too. For example: you're a joke!
Hey man, the gun isn't stupid, you are!
Suits you fine, huh?
Relax! Why make such a fuss?
The only thing you're gonna get is your butt kicked!
Oh yeah? Wait for the next one!
It was just a warning shot!
I'll scratch you to death!
That's not a scratch. It's a fucking canyon!
TAUNT.szTextCensored: That's not a scratch. It's a freaking canyon!

TAUNT.szText: No. You need to die!
I'll dig you one too with it!
Kiss my ass!
Fireball? What the fuck do you think this is, some kind of video game?
TAUNT.szTextCensored: Fireball? What the hell do you think this is, some kind of video game?

TAUNT.szText: It's OK, I'm here. Follow my voice!
That's what she said!
Please, let it be a close encounter of the sexy kind!
I'm ready any time you are!
Now, now, you're hurting our feelings!
Come on, there's always a room to try something new!
Come over here, I'll give you some.
Is that how it's called these days?
That must the first time ever you're saying that!
Oh, now I'm getting jelous.
I can help you to deal with the grief, if you want!
Where? Where?
Maybe I could help you with that?
You need to empty the chamber...
But that's nothing new for you, eh?
Damn, that doesn't even deserve a witty response!
Are you even listening what you're saying?
Oh, I'll give you one! Just you wait!
You should consider changing your masseur. I volunteer!
Yeah, I bet you did. God.
Oooh. Not today!
No!
Anything for you, princess.
I work this way on women.
Are you doing this on purpose?
Pffft.
Pffft.
I'm just going to pretend I didn't hear that.
Hold on! I'll just drop my clothes, get my rescue tube and I'm coming to save you!
